extension.description: Best Build for Jesus Box Media / Wizard / ##CREDIT TO JP HIGHTEK FOR CREATING THIS WIZARD ##

Welcome and Thank you for Downloading our wizard. [CR]The XOne Wizard allows you have free access to all the custom builds for your Kodi on your streaming Box. [CR]Run maintenance, Clear cache, Clear packages, keep your Trakt and Real Debrid data and man ymore.

extension.summary: Watch all your movie trailers in the highest quality 4k
extension.description: Welcome! The 4K Trailers channel is your destination for hot new trailers the second they drop. The difference between our channels and other Trailer youtube channel is the quality. We deliver the Trailers in Native 4K which gives you a better experience and enjoyment. The 4K Trailers team is here day and night to make sure all the hottest new movie trailers are available whenever you want them.

extension.summary: Movies and TV Shows on [COLOR red]FlixNet[/COLOR]
extension.description: Created by developer [COLOR red]JP Hightek[/COLOR] for Jesus Box Media. Please visit [COLOR red]www.jesusboxmedia.tv[/COLOR] for FlixNet support and assistance! Please remember that Flixnet is not an official part of the Kodi media player you are running, and therefore is not to be mentioned within official support channels of Kodi, this addon has nothing to do with the media player itself, nor it’s intended use, it is simply a third party plugin which has been added to your system.
extension.disclaimer: The author does not host or distribute any of the content displayed by this addon. The author does not have any affiliation with the content provider.
extension.description: Bitte besuche [COLOR red]www.jesusboxmedia.tv[/COLOR] für Unterstützung und Fragen zu FlixNet! Beachte dabei, dass FlixNet nicht offizieller Teil des Media Players ist den du gerade verwendest und daher nicht von dem offiziellen Support-Kanäle abgedeckt wird, dieses Addon hat nichts zu tun mit dem Media-Player selbst, noch ist es dafür beabsichtigt, es handelt sich hierbei lediglich um ein Drittanbieter-Anwendung die dem System hinzugefügt wurde.
extension.disclaimer: Die von diesem Addon dargestellten Inhalte werden von den Erstellern des Addons weder gehostet oder verbreitet, noch stehen die Ersteller in irgendeiner Beziehung zu den Content-Anbietern.
extension.description: SVP visitez [COLOR red]www.jesusboxmedia.tv[/COLOR] pour avoir de l'aide sur FlixNet. Prenez note que FlixNet n'est pas une partie intégrante de votre outil de visionnement multimedia et SVP ne le mentionnez pas dans les media sociaux officiels, cet addiciel n'a rien a voir avec votre lecteur multimedia lui même, c'est simplement un addiciel qui a été ajouté à votre système.
extension.disclaimer: L'auteur n'héberge pas ou ne distribue pas le contenu qui vous est affiché avec cet addiciel. L'auteur n'a pas d'alliance avec les distributeurs de contenu.
extension.news: - Initial release - Free movies - Free TV Shows

extension.description: Best IPTV solution for Kodi. Watch over 500+ High quality channels, TV Guide, Sports, PPV, 1 account up to 5 connections.
Watch over 1500 premium Live tv. No buffering, No kicking out. Channels from all over the world. USA, UK, ASIA, AFRICA and more.
extension.disclaimer: This addon is regulated by General Public License:https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/GNU_General_Public_License

extension.description: Best IPTV solution for Kodi. Watch 500+ High quality channels, TV Guide, Sports, PPV, 1 account 2 connections.

[fix/upd] replace custom simple_requests with script.module.requests to resolve ssl and cross-platform issues [add] 'Reset access manager' added to Maintenance section, sign out process(available when logged out) to clean up tokens in settings.xml [upd] set default for SSL certificate verification to 'true'
extension.description: YouTube is one of the biggest video-sharing websites of the world.
YouTube ist eines der größten Video-Sharing-Websites der Welt.
YouTube jest jednym z największych na świecie serwisów udostępniania wideo.
A YouTube világ egyik legnagyobb videómegosztó weboldala.
YouTube es un uno de los mayores sitios web de intercambio de vídeos del mundo.
Данное дополнение позволяет находить и смотреть видео на всеми любимом сайте.
YouTube est l'un des plus grands sites de partage vidéos du monde.
「Youtube」是全世界最大的影片分享網站
YouTube е един от най-големите уеб сайтове за споделяне на видео в целия свят.
Το YouTube είναι μία από τις μεγαλύτερες ιστοσελίδες διαμοιρασμού βίντεο στον κόσμο.
YouTube er en av verdens største nettsider for videodeling.

extension.description: MySQL Connector/Python is implementing the MySQL Client/Server protocol completely in Python. This means you don't have to compile anything or MySQL (client library) doesn't even have to be installed on the machine.

extension.news:
*** Twitch API V5 is deprecated and will be removed entirely on 2/14/18 *** script.module.python.twitch v2 will include the Twitch helix API, and may include breaking changes to current implementations. If you rely on this module follow development at https://github.com/MrSprigster/script.module.python.twitch
[fix/upd] v5.channels deprecated notations for community endpoints, add new communities endpoints
extension.summary: Module for interaction with the Twitch.tv API
extension.description: python-twitch for Kodi is module for interaction with the Twitch.tv API based on python-twitch by ingwinlu.

extension.description: Six is a Python 2 and 3 compatibility library. It provides utility functions for smoothing over the differences between the Python versions with the goal of writing Python code that is compatible on both Python versions. See the documentation for more information on what is provided.

extension.summary: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju.
extension.description: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju, pojednostavnjuje razvoj priključaka za video dodatke koji zahtjevaju višestruke video izvore.
